title: CryptoSlater
author: CryptoSlater
content: I think this is a good read https://cointelegraphfeed.com/?06-19-amazon-creating-token-june-23Whether you like that project or not but it should boost all the coins, I can already see some market shifting. We had a lot of rumors but now they finally pull it, what ya think?

comments.author: KiranKBS
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 19, 2023, 09:20:05 PMI think this is a good read https://cointelegraphfeed.com/?06-19-amazon-creating-token-june-23Whether you like that project or not but it should boost all the coins, I can already see some market shifting. We had a lot of rumors but now they finally pull it, what ya think?That's just fake and AMZ scams seem back on trending again!

comments.author: CryptoSlater
comments.body: It's not a fake, more articleshttps://eucryptonews.net/?amz-release-06-18https://cryptoslatefeed.com/?amazon-amz-token-about-to-launch-06-18You can even ask Amazon because I did that when I was still not sure about it and I got a clear reply on that as well. Learn to read. Neither of these public PR would release these articles if it wasn't for real, they would all run into big problems by Amazon or lawsuit if they publish such news without consent

comments.author: KiranKBS
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 19, 2023, 09:54:21 PMIt's not a fake, more articleshttps://eucryptonews.net/?amz-release-06-18https://cryptoslatefeed.com/?amazon-amz-token-about-to-launch-06-18You can even ask Amazon because I did that when I was still not sure about it and I got a clear reply on that as well. Learn to read. Neither of these public PR would release these articles if it wasn't for real, they would all run into big problems by Amazon or lawsuit if they publish such news without consentBro Really!Who are they wrote those Articles? SEC will not come and arrest for the volume of 200k or 1 million. Many such projects come and go with many Public PRs. So many Pepe versions came with doxx and gone.Really! If Amazon is releasing token, it is not a joke Bro. There would be a Press Release, news all over Bloomberg and Silicon Valley.Ok at least show your chat with Amazon.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.created_time: June 19, 2023, 10:45:17 PMLast edit: June 19, 2023, 11:19:22 PM by coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: CryptoSlater on June 19, 2023, 09:20:05 PMI think this is a good read https://cointelegraphfeed.com/?06-19-amazon-creating-token-june-23Whether you like that project or not but it should boost all the coins, I can already see some market shifting. We had a lot of rumors but now they finally pull it, what ya think?It's not a good read for me its looks like you are shilling this token this is a fake token that claims to come out from AmazonAnd if you're looking for a reliable news site you don't get it from newly created sites, these are created to promote scam projects for money, get it from a trusted source like Cointelegram.QuoteDomain:cointelegraphfeed.comRegistrar:Tucows Domains Inc.Registered On:2022-12-03Expires On:2023-12-03Updated On:2022-12-13https://www.whois.com/whois/cointelegraphfeed.comQuotecryptoslatefeed.comDomain InformationDomain:cryptoslatefeed.comRegistrar:Tucows Domains Inc.Registered On:2023-05-26Expires On:2024-05-26Updated On:2023-05-26https://www.whois.com/whois/cryptoslatefeed.com

comments.author: KiranKBS
comments.body: May i ask how to report this user and get banned? He is clearly targetting Newbies.He is creating many topics which is not only grabbing attention of Newbies but also polluting the forum.Below are his duplicate threads where Seniors warned.- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5456910.0- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5456257.0- https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5456976.0
